sources.name: source1
sources.script:
source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as integer,
		{Rotton Tomato} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1

transformations.name: Window1
transformations.script:
source1 window(over(year),
	asc(Rating, true),
	rank = rank(Rating)) ~> Window1
